mean_cn: v. 创作，作曲，形成，构成，使镇静
mean_en: to create and write (a piece of music or writing)
word_etyma: com一起 + pose放 → compose 组成，构成；创作
short_phrase: compose new songs on a keyboard
deformation_desc: 两个美妙的音符组成了字母M，为你谱写动听的乐章。
sentence: The man composes new songs on his keyboard.
sentence_trans: 这人在他的键盘上创作新歌。
